{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall establish within
				the

an office whose functions shall include establishing,
				administering, and disseminating widely information about the complaint
				tracking system established under

text.#text: The

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall coordinate
				with relevant Federal agencies to collect complaints from and route complaints
				to such agencies, as appropriate, with respect to educational products or
				services.

text.#text: The

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall communicate with an institution of
				higher education about complaints received through the complaint tracking
				system with respect to such institution.

text.#text: The

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall provide a summary to an institution of higher education, at
				least once a year, of the numbers and types of complaints that have been filed
				with respect to such institution.

text.#text:
Without
				sharing any personally identifiable information and in accordance with

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
section
				444 of the General Education Provisions Act

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
, commonly known as
				the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act of 1974
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act of 1974

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
may share a complaint and the information of the individual
				submitting the complaint with the institution against which the complaint has
				been filed, if such individual who has filed the complaint affirms that the

may share that individual's personal information and complaint with
				the institution.

text.#text:
Notwithstanding any other provision of law,
				the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: ; and

text.#text:
provide an
				institution with 90 days to respond to a complaint filed with respect to the
				institution with the complaint tracking system established under

consider such
				response and any resolution of the complaint when utilizing the information
				from the complaint during a program review.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall—

text.#text: The

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall share consumer complaint information
				with, and collect such information from, relevant Federal agencies and relevant
				State entities or agencies regarding educational products or services, in
				accordance with applicable data privacy laws and regulations, except that any
				personally identifiable information from the education records of students
				shall not be shared.

text.#text: The

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall publish on a publically accessible website information and
				analyses about complaint numbers, complaint types, and, where applicable,
				information about the resolution of complaints collected under this
				subsection.

text.#text: The

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:

Section 487(a) of the Higher Education

be liable for the
